Uttarakhand Soil Data.description: Describes soil type and other details of Uttarakhand soil.

columns.type: Varchar - Soil classification (SANDY AND LITTORAL SOILS,RECENT ALLUVIAL SOILS,Not Available,BROWN FOREST AND PODZOLIC SOILS,SKELETAL SOILS,SNOW,TARAI SOILS,RECENT COLLUVIAL (PIEDMONT) DERIVED SOILS,ROCK OUTCROP)
columns.depth: Varchar - Soil depth categories ( Not available, Shallow(25-50cm),Very shallow(10-25cm),Extremely shallow(<10cm),Deep(depth>50cm))
columns.erosion: Varchar - Erosion levels (Very severe/gullied,Not available,None to slight, Severe, Moderate)
columns.texture: Varchar - Soil texture types (Loam,Rocky,Finer than silty clay loam, Loamy sand, Not avaiable)
columns.productivity: Varchar - Productivity levels (NON PRODUCTIVE,HIGHLY PRODUCTIVE,MODERATELY PRODUCTIVE,LOW PRODUCTIVE)

Uttarakhand Roads Data.description: Describes road types and their lengths in Uttarakhand.

columns.type: Varchar - Type of road (Foot path,Village road  (Pucca),Cart track,District road,National highway,Village road (Kuchha),City road,State highway)

columns.forest_description: Varchar - Type of forest (Forest Evergreen/Semi Evergreen - Dense/Close,Forest Evergreen/Semi Evergreen - Open,Forest - Deciduous (Dry/Moist/Thorn) - Dense/Close,Forest - Forest Blank,Forest - Scrub Forest,Forest - Deciduous (Dry/Moist/Thorn) - Open,Forest - Forest Plantation

columns.type: Varchar - Type of drainage (Distributory canal,Stream,Main canal,Drain,River,Stream,Branch canal)

Uttarakhand LULC (Land Use Land Cover) D.description: Land use and land cover classification for Uttarakhand in 2015.

columns.type: Varchar - LULC classification (Builtup-village,Scrubland Dense,Forest Plantation,Lakes/Ponds,Gullied / Ravinous land,Waterlogged / Marshy Land,Reservoir/tanks,Barren Rocky,Forest,Bultup-Mixed settlement,Builtup-Rural,Builtup-Hamlets,Sandy Area,Builtup-Transportation,Peri -urban,Snow/ Glacier,Agriculture Plantation,Builtup-Urban,Bultup-Mining/industrial,Water Body,Canal,Scrubland Open,Grassland/Grazing land,Agriculture Crop,Core urban)

columns.flood_plain: Varchar- Type of Flood Plain(Active Flood Plain,Older Flood Plain)

Uttarakhand Contour 100 meter Data.description: Contour of Uttarakhand with elevation interval of 100

Uttarakhand Contour 200 meter Data.description: Contour of Uttarakhand with elevation interval of 200

Uttarakhand Contour 500 meter Data.description: Contour of Uttarakhand with elevation internal of 500

Uttarakhand Districts Data.description: Administrative boundary of districts in Uttarakhand

columns.district: VarChar - Name of the District(ALMORA,TEHRI GARHWAL,UDHAM SINGH NAGAR,UTTARKASHI,HARIDWAR,NAINITAL,CHAMOLI,BAGESHWAR,CHAMPAWAT,PITHORAGARH,PAURI GARHWAL,RUDRAPRAYAG,DEHRADUN)

columns.name: VarChar - Name of the fault(Main Central Thrust (MCT), Himalayan Frontal Thrust (HFT),North Almora Thrust (NAT),South Tibetan Detachment Fault (STDF),South Almora Thrust (SAT),Ramgarh Thrust (RT),Main Boundary Thrust (MBT))

Uttarakhand Glacial Lakes Data.description: Type of Glacial lakes in Uttarakhand

columns.lake_type: varchar - Type of lake(Supra-glacial Lake,Cirque Erosion Lake,Other Glacial Lake,Other Glacial Erosion Lake,Lateral Moraine Dammed Lake,Other Moraine Dammed Lake,End-moraine Dammed Lake)
columns.area_ha_: numeric - Area of the lake in hactare
columns.geom: USER-DEFINED - Geometry of the Glacial lake

columns.area: numeric - Area of the glacial lake
